Interface IMST

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Prim

    public interface IMST

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getValueMST() 
      boolean isMinimalSpanningTree(GraphAdjacenteList subGraph)
      If the number of vertex in this subGraph is different from the superGraph, throw an IllegalGraphFormatException.
      GraphAdjacenteList search()
      Execute the Algorithm searching the Minimal Spanning Tree from the Graph.

    • Method Detail

      • search

        GraphAdjacenteList search()
                          throws IllegalGraphFormatException
        Execute the Algorithm searching the Minimal Spanning Tree from the Graph.

        While the HeapMin is not Empty, I remove the vertex with minimum width from the HeapMin. If this vertex minimum is not a Font, I will add this edge from the result Graph.

        And executing the relaxation, a for each in all adjacent vertex from the source vertex removed in the HeapMin, if this adjacent vertex exist in the HeapMin and the edge width is less than adjacent vertex width, I will set the edge width value in adjacent width value and update then from HeapMin.

        Returns:
        The Graph result.
        Throws:
        IllegalGraphFormatException

      • getValueMST

        int getValueMST()
        Returns:
        The sum of the all width edges the Minimal Spanning Tree result.

      • isMinimalSpanningTree

        boolean isMinimalSpanningTree(GraphAdjacenteList subGraph)
                              throws IllegalGraphFormatException
        If the number of vertex in this subGraph is different from the superGraph, throw an IllegalGraphFormatException. If the number of edge in this subGraph is 0(zero) or each edge is not a Bridge, throw an IllegalGraphFormatException. If this subGraph passed is disconnected, throw an IllegalGraphFormatException.

        Sum each edgeWidth from the subGraph edges and compare this sum with the sum resulted from the PRIM. If is equals, return True.

        Parameters:
        subGraph -
        Returns:
        Sum each edgeWidth from the subGraph edges and compare this sum with the sum resulted from the PRIM. If is equals, return True.
        Throws:
        IllegalGraphFormatException
